meanings.definition: The quality or state of being grim.
meanings.sent1: The grimness of the situation was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The movie had a sense of grimness that lingered long after it ended.
meanings.sent3: Despite the grimness of the weather, we decided to have a picnic.
meanings.sent4: The grimness of the news cast a shadow over the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The grimness of the old haunted house sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: A grim or depressing quality or atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: The room was filled with a palpable grimness.
meanings.sent2: The grimness of the painting made me feel uneasy.
meanings.sent3: Despite the grimness of the situation, she managed to find a reason to smile.
meanings.sent4: The grimness of the hospital room was suffocating.
meanings.sent5: The grimness of the abandoned building gave me an eerie feeling.
